summary: Implements a multi-section marketing site with header navigation, martial-arts themed styling, a contact form wired to backend APIs, and an Internet Identity-based admin gate. However, backend persistence via stable storage is not evidenced, required generated image assets are not evidenced as added, and several unrequested backend/user-profile/access-control features appear introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores inquiries in stable storage so they persist across reloads.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend stores submissions in an in-memory `let submissions = List.empty<ContactSubmission>()` with no `stable var` or `preupgrade/postupgrade` persistence logic shown, so persistence across canister upgrades/reloads is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: Code references the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show the required files being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (no such paths are listed among added files; omitted files are unspecified).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile storage and APIs (get/save caller profile; admin can view others).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any user profile feature or APIs; only contact inquiries and an admin inquiries list were required.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom access-control initialization via secret URL parameter `caffeineAdminToken` and backend mixin authorization framework.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires Internet Identity protection for an admin view; it does not request a secret-token initialization mechanism or a generalized permission system.
